meta_description: Through our complicated history, through light and shadow, we have persevered – humanity intact. Art is the reason.
hours_text:
#### VISIT

# As Charleston’s only visual arts museum, we welcome all audiences – from frequent visitors to first-time guests.

We welcome visitors with an activity-filled first floor that’s free and open to the public. Purchase tickets to view the galleries on the second and third floors. We recommend purchasing tickets in advance for Saturday and Sunday admission (non-members).

Each week on Wednesdays at 1PM and on Fridays at 1PM guests can join a public tour with one of our Museum Interpreters.   
_*Please note public tours may be canceled without notice pending availability or other emergencies._

## The Museum Store

The Museum Store showcases the creativity of regional artists, and collaborates with artists on exclusive products only available at the Gibbes. Featured products include jewelry, gifts, art supplies, books, and specialty items - introducing art into everyday life. Every tax-free purchase directly supports the Gibbes Museum's mission to enhance lives through art by helping to fund our exhibition and educational programming. In-store shopping is currently limited due to social-distancing requirements. Shop now at [store.gibbesmuseum.org](https://store.gibbesmuseum.org). 

To introduce your products and be considered as a vendor, or to make an appointment to shop in-person, email Megan Roe, Associat Director of Retail and Visitor Experience, at [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#4528372a2005222c272720362830362030286b2a3722).
